thread.title: Lise Gillet
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Lise Gillet

author: Lise Gillet
title: Lise Gillet
text:
Unfortunately for me there was no more my size and they refund me immediately my order.
Beautiful clothes collection, attractive prices, caring customer service : a PERFECT virtual shop...
